title: How many pounds of potatoes does the average McDonalds use in one day? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is an interesting question, as the potatoes that get to the store have already been partially cooked, reducing the weight (which also saves on freight). Back in the days when we used fresh potatoes in McDonald’s and I wrote the procedures for cooking, we had some stores that consumed an average of 1 ton a day, carried in on the backs of the workers, peeled, and processed.

My particular store used approximately 10 to 12 cases of fries per day they are 35 pounds each. I did my truck order every Monday and wednesday and ordered around 50 cases or so depending on what i had on hand.
